title.value: Immunization Evaluation Dose Status Reason codes

description.value: This code system supports describing the reason why an administered dose has been assigned a particular status. Often, this reason describes why a dose is considered invalid.

definition.value: The full volume of the dose was not administered to the patient.
The vaccine experienced a cold chain break.
The vaccine was recalled by the manufacturer.
The vaccine experienced adverse storage conditions.
The vaccine was expired at the time of administration.
The vaccine was administered in a manner that is inconsistent with the evaluated schedule.
